verses.verse: Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnah,<s%> [one] of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

So he <S%H5927>came<s%> <S%H5927>back<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his father and <S%H1>mother,<s%> "I <S%H517>saw<s%> a <S%H7200>woman<s%> in <S%H802>Timnah,<s%> [one] of the <S%H8553>daughters<s%> of the <S%H1323>Philistines;<s%> <S%H6430>now<s%> therefore, <S%H6258>get<s%> her for me as a <S%H3947>wife.<s%>"

Then his father and his <S%H1>mother<s%> <S%H517>said<s%> to him, "Is <S%H559>there<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>woman<s%> among the <S%H802>daughters<s%> of your <S%H1323>relatives,<s%> or among <S%H251>all<s%> our <S%H3605>people,<s%> that you <S%H5971>go<s%> to <S%H1980>take<s%> a <S%H3947>wife<s%> from the <S%H802>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6189>Philistines<s%>?" But <S%H6430>Samson<s%> <S%H8123>said<s%> to his father, <S%H559>"Get<s%> her for me, for she <S%H1>looks<s%> <S%H3947><s%> <S%H3474>good<s%> to me."

However, his father and <S%H1>mother<s%> did not <S%H517>know<s%> that it was of the <S%H3045>Lord,<s%> for He was <S%H3068>seeking<s%> an <S%H1245>occasion<s%> <S%H9637>against<s%> the <S%H4480>Philistines.<s%> Now at that <S%H6430>time<s%> the <S%H6256>Philistines<s%> were <S%H6430>ruling<s%> over <S%H4910>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> with his father and <S%H1>mother,<s%> and <S%H517>came<s%> as <S%H935>far<s%> as the <S%H5704>vineyards<s%> of <S%H3754>Timnah;<s%> and <S%H8553>behold,<s%> a <S%H2009>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> [came] <S%H738>roaring<s%> <S%H7580>toward<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> upon him <S%H9484>mightily,<s%> so that he <S%H8156>tore<s%> him as one <S%H8156>tears<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> though he <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H369><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but he did not <S%H5046>tell<s%> his father or <S%H1>mother<s%> <S%H517>what<s%> he had <S%H834>done.<s%>
So he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> to the <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she <S%H3474>looked<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H3474>good<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson.<s%>

When he <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H4480>later<s%> <S%H3117><s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her, he <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H4658>carcass<s%> of the <S%H9030>lion;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H5712>swarm<s%> of <S%H1682>bees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> were in the <S%H1472>body<s%> of the <S%H9030>lion.<s%>

So he <S%H9544>scraped<s%> the honey into his <S%H3709>hands<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> on, <S%H398>eating<s%> as he <S%H1980>went.<s%> When he <S%H1980>came<s%> to his father and <S%H1>mother,<s%> he <S%H517>gave<s%> [some] to them and they <S%H5414>ate<s%> [it;] but he did not <S%H398>tell<s%> them that he had <S%H5046>scraped<s%> the <S%H9544>honey<s%> out of the <S%H1706>body<s%> of the <S%H1472>lion.<s%>

Then his father <S%H1>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3381>woman;<s%> and <S%H802>Samson<s%> <S%H8123>made<s%> a <S%H6213>feast<s%> <S%H4960>there,<s%> for the <S%H8033>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> customarily <S%H970>did<s%> <S%H6213>this.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him that they <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H4828>companions<s%> to be with him.

Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Let me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2330>propound<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to you; <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H5046>indeed<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> it to me within the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and <S%H4672>find<s%> it out, then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>linen<s%> <S%H5466>wraps<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H3808>unable<s%> <S%H3201><s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>linen<s%> <S%H5466>wraps<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothes.<s%>" And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2330>"Propound<s%> your <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it."

So he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Out of the <S%H398>eater<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3978>something<s%> to <S%H3978>eat,<s%> And out of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H4966>something<s%> <S%H4966>sweet.<s%>" But they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7637>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H559>said<s%> to Samson's <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H6601>"Entice<s%> your <S%H376>husband,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>tell<s%> us the <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> we <S%H8313>burn<s%> you and your father's <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> Have you <S%H7121>invited<s%> us to <S%H3423>impoverish<s%> us? Is this not [so?]"

And Samson's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and you do not <S%H157>love<s%> me; you have <S%H2330>propounded<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have not <S%H5046>told<s%> [it] to me." And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have not <S%H5046>told<s%> [it] to my father or <S%H1>mother;<s%> so should I <S%H517>tell<s%> you?"

However she <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>while<s%> their <S%H4960>feast<s%> <S%H1961>lasted.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H6693>pressed<s%> him so <S%H6693>hard.<s%> She then <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of her <S%H5971>people.<s%>

So the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H2775>sun<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> down, <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>? And <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H5794>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3884>"If<s%> you had not <S%H9177>plowed<s%> with my <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> You would not have <S%H4672>found<s%> out my <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>"

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> upon him <S%H9484>mightily,<s%> and he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> of them and <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H2488>spoil,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H2487>changes<s%> [of clothes] to those who <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%> And his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned,<s%> and he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to his father's <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But Samson's <S%H802>wife<s%> was [given] to his <S%H4828>companion<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had been his <S%H9566>friend.<s%>
